title: Textile
medium: Technique: block printed with mordant on plain weave; immersion dyed in madder; two blocks were used in an A and B alternation
dimensions:
A. Warp; 34 1/4 in. (87cm) by weft (selvedge to selvedge) 37in. (94cm.) B. Warp 34 1/4 in. (87cm) by weft (right selvedge only) 9 in.(23cm.)
Pattern: Half-drop. Four units across fabric.
description: Lattice of ribbons and flowers. A cat in a basket within each lozenge.

tombstone.epitaph: Textile.Technique: block printed with mordant on plain weave; immersion dyed in madder; two blocks were used in an A and B alternation. 1985-6-2-a,b.
